attributes.action: Make Wycombe District Council Fix the Roads
attributes.additional_details:
Wycombe district council are trying to push through plans to do more work in the town centre, this will drive in traffic to our already substantially damaged roads, stop them spending 36 million on things we dont need and make them spend it on what we do need. new roads everywhere.

http://www.bucksfreepress.co.uk/news/9678481.Council_bosses_to_rule_over_Wycombe_Masterplan/?ref=mr

rejection.details: Highways maintenance is a matter for Buckinghamshire County Council; spending by Wycombe District Council is a matter for its councillors.
